item.title: US Politics Is World Politics
item.description:
Original Thread: https://social.thiskurt.me/@kurt/115839472741051165

subtoot/uspol is worldpol prelude

“So I guess we could go into the US, kidnap Trump and drag him to The Hague.”

This is stupid for two reasons:

  1. Europe is incapable of taking this action. It would never be able to handle the fallout.

  2. This is exactly the kind of world Trump ones. One where foreign territory means nothing and only the might of the powerful matters.

He just wants America to be one of the powerful, and they already have the might.
